channel.title: Sqlite on The Plone Expanse
channel.description: Recent content in Sqlite on The Plone Expanse

item.title: How to use pgloader to migrate sqlite database to postgresql
item.description: I needed to migrate a Kotti database, from its default sqlite file store, to Postgresql. Clued in by StackOverflow, I've tried using pgloader, but the version coming with Ubuntu is old: 2.x instead of the brand new 3.x. But the jump to 3.x meant a switch in programming languages as well: the new one is written in Lisp. I didn't want to install and compile the whole Lisp bundle just to run pgloader and I didn't find a binary distribution either, and after a recent exposure to Docker, I thought I'll give the dockerized version of pgloader a try.
